title: NBA Playoffs with "Big Shot" Robert Horry
itunes:title: NBA Playoffs with "Big Shot" Robert Horry
description:
Miles and Jack were honored to be joined by the 7-time NBA Champion for the Rockets, Lakers and Spurs, Robert Horry on the latest installment of Mad Boosties. Beyond getting his thoughts and analysis on the current NBA playoffs, including predictions for each Conference Finals series, they dove into some of Rob's greatest moments as a player and plenty more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
